lines: WHERE HE LEAD ME I WILL GO
Hi Wena Ntshembo Wa Mina; Hikokwalaho Ka Mina, U Vambiwile Khalvhari.
Hambi Vusiku, Nhlekani, Yesu U Ta Ndzi Letela; Nakulorhi Wa Ntiyiso,
2. Ndza Swi Rhandza Swiletelo, Na Vurhangeri Bya Wena,
Nhlawuleko Wa Rirhandzu, Ri Tengisiwe Khalvhari.
3. Ndzi Ya Mahlweni Hi Xivindzi, Ndzi Tsakile Eka Yesu;
Siku Rin’wana Nta N’wi Vona, Yesu Nakulorhi Wanga.
